errors.categoryDisabled: This notification category is disabled or it is quiet hours

donate.heading: Support New Kenya
donate.description: Your contribution helps mobilize volunteers and reach voters.

about.title: About the Campaign
about.missionText: To build a unified, prosperous, and innovative Kenya through inclusive governance, economic empowerment, and sustainable development, ensuring every citizen has the opportunity to thrive in a modern, dynamic nation.

unity.title: Unity
unity.desc: Fostering national cohesion and celebrating our diversity as our strength.

progress.title: Progress
progress.desc: Embracing innovation and sustainable development for future generations.

justice.title: Justice
justice.desc: Ensuring equal opportunities and fair treatment for all Kenyans.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.desc: Maintaining open, accountable leadership and governance.

about.visionText: This is a modern, dynamic campaign — focused on renewing institutions, investing in youth, and delivering inclusive growth. The candidate brings public service experience, a clear plan for economic transformation, and a commitment to national unity.

vision.visionText: A New Kenya — united, prosperous and secure for every citizen. Where innovation drives growth and opportunity reaches every corner of our nation.
vision.trackRecordText: Public leadership across sectors with a focus on results and transparency. Proven success in economic development and institutional reform.

promise.heading: Campaign Promise
promise.quote: Together, we will build a New Kenya where unity is our strength, innovation drives our progress, and prosperity reaches every citizen. This is not just a campaign — it's a movement for transformative change.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Questions about the campaign, press inquiries, or partnership requests — reach out to us.

volunteer.a: Visit the Get Involved page and fill the volunteer signup form.

donations.q: Is this site secure for donations?
donations.a: Donations in this demo are mocked. Integrate a payment gateway for production.

events.q: How do I attend an event?
events.a: Go to the Events page and RSVP for an event.

footer.tagline: A campaign for every Kenyan — unity, growth, and opportunity.

getInvolved.title: Get Involved
getInvolved.description: Volunteer, host an event, or join a local chapter.

youthAgenda.title: Campaign launches nationwide youth agenda
youthAgenda.content: Today we launched a nationwide youth agenda to create apprenticeship and startup opportunities...

nakuruTownhall.title: Townhall in Nakuru draws thousands
nakuruTownhall.content: The Nakuru townhall brought community leaders together to discuss local governance and jobs.

ruralConnectivity.title: Policy paper: Rural digital connectivity
ruralConnectivity.content: Our policy paper outlines a roadmap to bring high-speed internet to rural counties.

shop.title: Shop
shop.description: Official merchandise — demo store (no real payments).

success.title: Thank you for signing up!
success.desc: We appreciate your support. Our team will contact you soon.

form.name: Name*
form.interestsPlaceholder: How would you like to help?

hero.subtitle: A modern vision for unity, jobs, and opportunity
hero.lead: We are building a New Kenya — one that invests in youth, strengthens communities, and modernizes institutions. Join us to make it happen.

team.title: Team
team.description: Meet the campaign's team and leadership.

leader.name: Campaign Leader
leader.title: Leader
leader.bio: Experienced public servant focused on inclusive growth.

manager.name: Campaign Manager
manager.title: Manager
manager.bio: Leading operations and field teams across the country.

install.title: Install New Kenya
install.desc: Get quick access to updates and stay connected with the movement
